pkgmetadata.longdescription: Random Number Generation Functions for 'rxode2' // Provides the random number generation (in parallel) needed for 'rxode2' (Wang, Hallow and James (2016) doi:10.1002/psp4.12052) and 'nlmixr2' (Fidler et al (2019) doi:10.1002/psp4.12445). This split will reduce computational burden of recompiling 'rxode2'.
